019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import freemarker.template.Configuration;
022import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
024import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.Dynamics;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.io.StringWriter;
028import java.util.Map;
029import java.util.logging.Logger;
030import org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions;
031import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
032import org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.SafeConstructor;
033
034/**
035 * Delegee for reconciling the service
036 */
037@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
038/* default */ class ServiceReconciler {
039
040    protected final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(getClass().getName());
041    private final Configuration fmConfig;
042
043    /**
044     * Instantiates a new service reconciler.
045     *
046     * @param fmConfig the fm config
047     */
048    public ServiceReconciler(Configuration fmConfig) {
049        this.fmConfig = fmConfig;
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Reconcile.
054     *
055     * @param event the event
056     * @param model the model
057     * @param channel the channel
058     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
059     * @throws TemplateException the template exception
060     * @throws ApiException the api exception
061     */
062    public void reconcile(VmDefChanged event,
063            Map<String, Object> model, VmChannel channel)
064            throws IOException, TemplateException, ApiException {
065        // Get API
066        DynamicKubernetesApi svcApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
067            "services", channel.client());
068
069        // Combine template and data and parse result
070        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("runnerService.ftl.yaml");
071        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
072        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
073        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
074        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
075        var mapDef = Dynamics.newFromYaml(
076            new Yaml(new SafeConstructor(new LoaderOptions())), out.toString());
077
078        // Apply
079        K8s.apply(svcApi, mapDef, out.toString());
080    }
081
082}
